page.title: 20SHOP SURVEY, PADIHAM.
page.content:
Padiham shops mainly line the A671 for about a mile. There are 147 shops or business premises by the roadside. The shops can be grouped in 52 different categories, ranging from grocers and florists to banks and second hand shops. The largest of these groups is that of empty shops, which amount to 10% of all premises. It is likely that this reflects an increase in car ownership, as people travel further for lower prices and a wider range of goods, and the high rate of unemployment in the area.
Of shops actually trading, the most common are second-hand shops and take-away, hot food shops. There are 15 types of food shop, making up 33% of the total number of shops.
